entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Local blowing snow before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
